 Newsletters 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 Each month, the UCR Library sends out our free email newsletter to share information about upcoming events, exhibitions and the latest UCR Library news with UC Riverside students, faculty, alumni and library stakeholders. 
 Click on the links below to read previous issues of the Library Newsletter, or  sign up to receive future issues  delivered straight to your inbox.
